class_notes:
(Permission Required Prior to Enrollment)


Application required. Complete course atlas information (including texts and grading) and application form will be available on the Creative Writing Program website in MID-OCTOBER: https://creativewriting.emory.edu/index.html
course_description: Spring semester. Admittance by assessment of readiness for advanced work by intermediate level instructor in genre. Intensive workshop in the writing of poetry for advanced students. May be repeated for a maximum of eight hours credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 4092, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-5:30p, Instructor: J. Brown, Status: Open
